# The `PPCII` Namespace Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppcii">PPCII</a> - This namespace holds all of the PowerPC target-specific per-instruction flags. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppcii">PPCII</a> - This namespace holds all of the PowerPC target-specific per-instruction flags.

These must match the corresponding definitions in PPC.td and PPCInstrFormats.td.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### anonymous enum  {#aff74ce051ea8820db7384ee6826d0471}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="anonymous enum ">

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="aff74ce051ea8820db7384ee6826d0471a89de693ba41c59ed962f9571eb6f20b5" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PPC970_First">
PPC970&#95;First - This instruction starts a new dispatch group, so it will always be the first one in the group (= 0x1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aff74ce051ea8820db7384ee6826d0471acb11d47c910b37516bd9a4fb15c7de43" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PPC970_Single">
PPC970&#95;Single - This instruction starts a new dispatch group and terminates it, so it will be the sole instruction in the group (= 0x2)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aff74ce051ea8820db7384ee6826d0471a8b8512a8f2e954aeeb98c8f24eda1447" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PPC970_Cracked">
PPC970&#95;Cracked - This instruction is cracked into two pieces, requiring two dispatch pipes to be available to issue (= 0x4)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aff74ce051ea8820db7384ee6826d0471a9de8ef894c3658424828ffc22ea43575" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PPC970_Shift">
PPC970&#95;Mask/Shift - This is a bitmask that selects the pipeline type that an instruction is issued to (= 3)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aff74ce051ea8820db7384ee6826d0471a7cec875ed7c232b602c5433ef76e6e73" />
<EnumerationListItem name="PPC970_Mask">
 (= 0x07 &lt;&lt; PPC970&#95;Shift)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

### anonymous enum  {#a9deac633b8c0fc89619d76d4d05e273d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="anonymous enum ">

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a9deac633b8c0fc89619d76d4d05e273da4b5f73325be34c748d292f6aac6b9095" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NewDef_Shift">
Shift count to bypass PPC970 flags (= 6)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a9deac633b8c0fc89619d76d4d05e273daabe404a41cd6c42173c719a7911563c5" />
<EnumerationListItem name="XFormMemOp">
This instruction is an X-Form memory operation (= 0x1 &lt;&lt; NewDef&#95;Shift)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a9deac633b8c0fc89619d76d4d05e273da57c485b93de14e13066ec4f32f99345d" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Prefixed">
This instruction is prefixed (= 0x1 &lt;&lt; (NewDef&#95;Shift + 1))
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a9deac633b8c0fc89619d76d4d05e273da4ff4fdb7188d27bc3d4968e5d675f0c4" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SExt32To64">
This instruction produced a sign extended result (= 0x1 &lt;&lt; (NewDef&#95;Shift + 2))
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a9deac633b8c0fc89619d76d4d05e273da0d0051d873cb4b1b2ec86509b76c3cca" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ZExt32To64">
This instruction produced a zero extended result (= 0x1 &lt;&lt; (NewDef&#95;Shift + 3))
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a9deac633b8c0fc89619d76d4d05e273da9723544a832c302e4b7d8c04425b05d1" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MemriOp">
This instruction takes a register+immediate memory operand (= 0x1 &lt;&lt; (NewDef&#95;Shift + 4))
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

### enum  {#ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ff}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::PPCII::TOF ">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> Operand Flag enum.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa9340a84aaf673899ce86db9f926ecc83" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_NO_FLAG">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffab055ede9c173349e17e7aada20410b93" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_PLT">
On <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc">PPC</a>, the 12 bits are not enough for all target operand flags
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffaf464d229c08e6d5eb945d7b905a7c9fd" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_PIC_FLAG">
MO&#95;PIC&#95;FLAG - If this bit is set, the symbol reference is relative to the function&#39;s picbase, e.g
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa777b254f8a19bf466553840f89ecaf31" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_PCREL_FLAG">
MO&#95;PCREL&#95;FLAG - If this bit is set, the symbol reference is relative to the current instruction address(pc), e.g., var@pcrel
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa8884a7365b40eb87c9dbc760b641a55a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_GOT_FLAG">
MO&#95;GOT&#95;FLAG - If this bit is set the symbol reference is to be computed via the GOT
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffaf4ba2908fdc36ea179a9e3f8eda40637" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_PCREL_OPT_FLAG">
MO&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT&#95;FLAG - If this bit is set the operand is part of a PC Relative linker optimization
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffae65924f7be0d235dfb37b97894d631b6" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSGD_FLAG">
MO&#95;TLSGD&#95;FLAG - If this bit is set the symbol reference is relative to TLS General Dynamic model for Linux and the variable offset of TLS General Dynamic model for AIX
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffac09dc26b3c7ea75dfd6da305042926cb" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TPREL_FLAG">
MO&#95;TPREL&#95;FLAG - If this bit is set, the symbol reference is relative to the thread pointer and the symbol can be used for the TLS Initial Exec and Local Exec models
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa1dcd064e63645a232083e4de59b09110" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSLDM_FLAG">
MO&#95;TLSLDM&#95;FLAG - on AIX the ML relocation type is only valid for a reference to a TOC symbol from the symbol itself, and right now its only user is the symbol &quot;&#95;$TLSML&quot;
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa77f81a23f8ce498f9ef4bbc5433c116b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSLD_FLAG">
MO&#95;TLSLD&#95;FLAG - If this bit is set the symbol reference is relative to TLS Local Dynamic model
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa6003030015cbe98f30d697c9c8a155bf" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSGDM_FLAG">
MO&#95;TLSGDM&#95;FLAG - If this bit is set the symbol reference is relative to the region handle of TLS General Dynamic model for AIX
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffaf045b588ae476aff3ea48b77c042f7b1" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_GOT_TLSGD_PCREL_FLAG">
MO&#95;GOT&#95;TLSGD&#95;PCREL&#95;FLAG - A combintaion of flags, if these bits are set they should produce the relocation @got@tlsgd@pcrel
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffad1af346db81472a462b7f04fa9498ab4" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_GOT_TLSLD_PCREL_FLAG">
MO&#95;GOT&#95;TLSLD&#95;PCREL&#95;FLAG - A combintaion of flags, if these bits are set they should produce the relocation @got@tlsld@pcrel
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa467b829ca0e160907522584b98b618a0" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_GOT_TPREL_PCREL_FLAG">
MO&#95;GOT&#95;TPREL&#95;PCREL&#95;FLAG - A combintaion of flags, if these bits are set they should produce the relocation @got@tprel@pcrel
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffacfbc322d45d593103140a6a0dd75e9cd" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_LO">
MO&#95;LO, MO&#95;HA - lo16(symbol) and ha16(symbol)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffaf3ceb6d8d3d044088a869d52777a6ed6" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_HA">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffac1c555a378ab914a0dcae6234359aa73" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TPREL_LO">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffaa7929b1029f09db9b9b538e0d200fdd8" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TPREL_HA">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffab5ab92a983f7ba2046b20389312e0512" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_DTPREL_LO">
These values identify relocations on immediates folded into memory operations
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa0ab30789f6ac6df962adba01f53c2888" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLSLD_LO">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffad512bc138c5c6766b7ee4f66e43d47b4" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TOC_LO">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffab99c6c8402edd4e84a137d89ad71169c" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLS">
Symbol for VK&#95;PPC&#95;TLS fixup attached to an ADD instruction
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffad28153a155549829b1d3c7c2c1f94eb3" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_PIC_HA_FLAG">
MO&#95;PIC&#95;HA&#95;FLAG = MO&#95;PIC&#95;FLAG | MO&#95;HA
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa374d4accc53d2911f6b45d9ae3c35941" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_PIC_LO_FLAG">
MO&#95;PIC&#95;LO&#95;FLAG = MO&#95;PIC&#95;FLAG | MO&#95;LO
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa4590d1594bf15001842f0bc03068dc7e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TPREL_PCREL_FLAG">
MO&#95;TPREL&#95;PCREL&#95;FLAG = MO&#95;PCREL&#95;FLAG | MO&#95;TPREL&#95;FLAG
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa81fba654d0446dd40efd2d2409643759" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MO_TLS_PCREL_FLAG">
MO&#95;TPREL&#95;PCREL&#95;FLAG = MO&#95;PCREL&#95;FLAG | MO&#95;TLS
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffa52449b426fd1a25588ddde25cca33a82" />
